metadata.synopsis: Ambient AD for mask of regret while hag's voodoo doll is still haunting the survivors
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Debugbook option "Act3 → LOW - Auntie Ethel's Revenge → Hag was defeated in Act I- Debug teleport to Hag Survivros building via debug book- Run into hag sruvivros located at -53; 11; -160- After the dialog, if combat didn' start, Mask of Regret will start patrolling part of the house, at some point she'll stop at -41; 11; -158 and do the AD

0.speaker: Mask of Regret
0.text: You survived a hag once - you can't be broken. You won't.
0.context: NodeContext: trying to give herself a pep talk. Stressed, frustrated and tired

1.speaker: Mask of Regret
1.text: You're not letting the hag win - not a chance.
1.context: NodeContext: trying to give herself a pep talk. Stressed, frustrated and tired

2.speaker: Mask of Regret
2.text: Come on - keep it together. You've got this.
2.context: NodeContext: trying to give herself a pep talk. Stressed, frustrated and tired
